Today in Sutherland, it's looking good with 3 ft @10s W swell and a moderate 14 mph SSE wind. Melvich and Strathy are your best bets, with prime tides for both. Tomorrow, conditions drop as the swell shifts to 3 ft @6s SW and fresh 29 mph S winds, making it poor across the board. Day after, similar poor conditions persist with 5 ft @7s SW and 26 mph S winds. Best: today.
